text: 12:32 Matyu 11:19; Luk 12:10; Jon 7:12; 7:52; 1 Timoti 1:13Eghtɨ gumazitam akar kuratam Gumazamizibar Otarim mɨkemeghtɨ, God an arazir kurar kam gɨn amadagham. Eghtɨ gumazitam Godɨn Duam akar kuratam a mɨkemeghtɨma, God dughiar kam ko gɨn izamin dughiamɨn, an arazir kurar kam gɨn amadaghan kogham. An arazir kurar kam an ikɨvɨra ikiam.”
